mapper.insert:
insert into room_cancel_rule_info (id, room_id, type, minutes,day,hour,penalty_percent, creator_id, create_time, modified_id, modified_time, is_visible, is_deleted) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.type}, #{item.minutes},#{item.day},#{item.hour},#{item.penaltyPercent}, #{item.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifiedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.isVisible,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER})
